name: Flame Charge
description: You cloak yourself with flame and lash out at a creature. Make a melee attack, dealing 1d8 + MOVE fire damage on a hit. With each successful hit from this move, increase your movement speed by 5 until you are incapacitated, are switched out, or the combat ends. (Maximum of +30 to movement speed)
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works well if the user is pumped up.
